title: (x) Ryder Cup 2004 | Team USA - Perpetua {Mike Y}
content:
What's the font featured in the [main headline](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121121108/http:/www.pga.com/rydercup/2004/us/)?   
   
Thanks

 [‹ (x) McSweeney's Quarterly no.13 - custom designed {Jes](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121121108/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5748 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Handwritten script - Schooner Script {Karen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121121108/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5732 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: It might be Perpetua. I'll get a link in a sec.

Todd Dominey designed this site (as well as most of the PGA Tour sites). He details the process, including type selection, on his website: [http://www.whatdoiknow.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121121108/http:/www.whatdoiknow.org/).   
   
It is, indeed, Perpetua.
